name: Panic Shopper - Ludum Date 46
description:
Hello!

This is my third 'game', if you can call any of my projects like that :) Made for Ludum Dare 46.

This was the first one I did without any support. All assets (except for Open Sans Google font) were done by myself. My approach was to take it easy (weather was too good to spend it only in-house on the game) - so it's definitelly not the best I could do during the weekend... But hey, it's something!

Tools used:

  • Godot Engine for main game
  • Aseprite for sprites
  • Beepbox for sound
